# contactRelations

**Instance Property**

An array of labeled contact relations for the contact.

## Declaration

```swift
var contactRelations: [CNLabeledValue<CNContactRelation>] { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property is an array of [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNLabeledValue] objects, each of which has a label and a [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContactRelation] value.

## Relating Other Information to the Contact

- **instantMessageAddresses**: An array of labeled IM addresses for the contact.
